statements: DELETE FROM field_experiments_environmental_data WHERE experiment_date = '2022-01-01' AND temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60;
DELETE FROM experimental_data WHERE measurement_type = 'temperature' AND measurement_value < 30.0;
DELETE FROM field_experiments WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50;
DELETE FROM experimental_data WHERE measurement_type = 'humidity' AND measurement_value < 40;
DELETE FROM field_sites WHERE site_name = 'Site A';
DELETE FROM Data WHERE measurement < 0.5 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Location WHERE latitude > 40.0 OR longitude < -100.0;
